ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Druid question
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are roleplaying it would be bad. If the bears con amiably to you it isn t great for roleplay purposes to hunt them. There dont seem to be any sort of
ygData.messageBody:
If you are roleplaying it would be bad. If the bears con amiably to you it
isn't great for roleplay purposes to hunt them. There dont' seem to be any
sort of problems in game terms when you kill them. No punishements (can't
think of the right term) for doing it-- unless you get caught by an npc
druid and then you'll get attacked.
luv,
-Su

> Hi, all. I'm relatively new to the list (been reading it for a month or
so, but I've never posted before).
>
> Here's my question: My lvl 10 Druid is currently in EC and I desperately
want to start hunting bears, would this be a bad
> thing for a Druid to do?
>
> Hest, lvl 10 Druid on Teris Thule
>
